Publication Title: State of the art in integrated biosensors for organ-on-a-chip applications
Publication Keywords: Physical environment, Metabolic activity, Biomarkers, Organ-on-a-chip, Integrated Biosensors
Publication Authors: Yangzhi Zhu, Kalpana Mandal, Ana Lopez Hernandez, Satoru Kawakita, Wei Huang, Praveen Bandaru, Samad Ahadian, Han-Jun Kim, Vadim Jucaud, Mehmet R Dokmeci, Ali Khademhosseini
Publication Abstract: Organ-on-a-chip (OoC) models are bioengineered tissue constructs integrated with microfluidics that recapitulate the key features of the physiology of human organs and tissues with applications related to drug development and personalized medicine.
